boardgame.name: Odlotowy wyścig
Steampunk Rally
boardgame.description: Steampunk Rally is a strategy game that incorporates steampunk as more than just a bit of chrome. Using a unique dice-placement mechanism, players take on the roles of famous inventors from the turn of the last century like Nikola Tesla and Marie Curie, constructing fantastical contraptions that make use of steam, heat and electricity in an attempt to win a no-holds-barred race through the Swiss alps._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each round starts with a card draft in which players carefully select machine parts to add to their invention and one-shot boost cards to aid them or hinder opponents. Players also have the option of discarding drafted cards for dice or cogs to power their invention, but they must make this tricky choice when each card is drafted._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Then, after venting dice to revitalize their machines, players roll their dice and use them to activate machine parts which provide things like movement, shielding, and additional dice with which to activate more parts. Driving through terrain causes damage, and if a player's damage gauge ends up in the red at the end of the turn, they must lose parts from their invention. These will need to be replaced in the draft phase, constantly forcing players to discover new synergies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Removed the outer shrink wrap from the game to check if everything is there. Cards still in shrink, unpunched. Kickstarter version: metal cogs! translucent dice!

Roxley Games (ROX200) Steampunk Rally is a strategy game that incorporates steampunk as more than just a bit of chrome. Using a unique dice-placement mechanism, players take on the roles of famous inventors from the turn of the last century like Nikola Tesla and Marie Curie, constructing fantastical contraptions that make use of steam, heat and electricity in an attempt to win a no-holds-barred race through the Swiss alps.
Weight 1.3 kg
Weight 1.3 kg

Punched but not played. Components and box are in pristine condition. This is the pre-upgraded retail version. Upgraded to the KS version which includes metal cogs and translucent dice. I paid $64.99 for my copy. Will ship via USPS Priority Medium Flat Rate Box for $10.

**ANY GAME I HAVE LISTED IS STILL FOR SALE, NO MATTER WHEN I’VE LISTED IT** This game has been demonstrated once*. It is in perfect condition. It weighs 3 pounds and will be shipped via USPS, so you can check rates from 68108. * For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demonstrated. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. Feel free to check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I charge actual shipping, so combining items will typically save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rated seller with over 4300 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well - check out my feedback! You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
